apiDoc.name: ZapButtonAvatars
apiDoc.description: A zap button that displays avatars of users who have sent zaps (Bitcoin Lightning payments). Provides the zap function via callback instead of auto-zapping. By default, shows only zappers from your follows (onlyFollows=true) to highlight support from your network. Displays the total sats amount prominently and supports both event and user profile zaps. Use the onclick callback to show a UI for collecting zap amount and comment, then call the provided zapFn.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: event
props.description: Event to show zaps for (either event or user required)

props.name: user
props.description: User to show zaps for (either event or user required)

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number of avatars to show

props.name: onlyFollows
props.description: When true and user is logged in, only displays avatars from users the current user follows

props.name: onclick
props.description: Callback when button is clicked, receives the zap function to call after collecting amount/comment from user
